ingredients.content: 2 pinches fine sea salt, or to taste
4 plaice fillets (approx. 125 g each), fresh or defrosted from frozen

preparations.content: Place parsley in mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 8<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place onions and oil in mixing bowl then chop <b>5 sec/speed 6<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula then sauté <b>3 min/120°C/speed 1<b>.

Add tomatoes, water and salt to mixing bowl. Place Varoma dish into position and weigh in 2 plaice fillets, skin side down. Insert Varoma tray and weigh onto tray remaining 2 plaice fillets, skin side down. Cover Varoma and cook <b>20 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>. Remove Varoma then transfer plaice fillets to serving dishes. Top with tomato sauce, garnish with reserved chopped parsley and serve immediately.
